text: Rubidium nitrate is a chemical compound. Its chemical formula is RbNO3. It is a colorless crystalline solid. It is an oxidizing agent. It is made by reacting rubidium or rubidium hydroxide with nitric acid. The reaction with rubidium is very violent. It is used to make other rubidium compounds. ==Related pages== *Rubidium oxide *Rubidium hydride *Potassium nitrate Category:Nitrates Category:Rubidium compounds
title: Rubidium nitrate
